name: Grave Looters
description:
Submission for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022

Description

In a post-apocalyptic world there's nothing left but the remains of those who are long gone... The perfect opportunity to plunder the dead's treasues - they won't need them after all. But beware: Your plundering might waken those who rest here. Death seems to be only the beginning these days...

Gameplay

Dark atmospheric horror setting. Avoid zombies and plunder graves to earn points. Game ends after getting killed or the timer runs out.

Controls
  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Walk: Shift (no benefit atm)
  • Dig: Hold mouse left/right
Asset Packs
  • Starter Assets - Third Person Character Controller
